comment: Hybrid class, so attendance is important. She's very caring & understanding if you have concerns. There are 3–4 essays (including exam and final essays) and about 4 discussion posts. She's an easy grader. Can't work ahead, content unlocks at the start or middle of the week after it's discussed in class. Lots of poems and readings on various poets.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Professor Morgan is truly outstanding! I took her class as a dual enrollment student, and she went above and beyond to support us. She's always available to explain concepts or provide feedback when needed. If you follow her directions, you're set up for success; she genuinely wants her students to excel. Highly recommended!

By far my favorite professor ever. She truly cares for all her students. Workload is manageable, and class gets canceled a lot, so you don't even go that often. She gives great feedback on your assignments. She's so funny and an amazing teacher. If I could have her for all my classes, I would. TAKE HER if you have the chance.
Professor Morgan is a great instructor. She doesn't waste time and offers really good advice about your work. She doesn't overcomplicate the material, and makes sure you understand the content well.

This professor Is so passionate and Knowledgeable about English and Specifically the readings given. She cares about the students and Only assigns a small amount of work throughout the whole semester, its an easy A as long as you read the authors works and Follow the directions of each Essay Exam. Definitely take this class

She does have almost weekly discussion board posts and reading quizzes every week, which are not multiple choice. She gives such good feedback on drafts, so you can get a good grade on the final draft!! There are 2 or 3 papers and a final project. She offers extra credit at the end of the semester. Overall great teacher!!

Easily one of, if not the best, teachers I've ever had. Super knowledgeable and funny. She made a boring class worth coming to. She doesn't take late work on "minor assignments," so all you have to do is stay on top of your homework (which there's very little of), and you'll be golden. Take this class, you won't regret it!!!

Super nice teacher, attendance mandatory and does not accept late work but class is very do able. I recommend her. Its a bunch of small easy assignments for easy grades and then a few big papers for major grades.
Very good prof that will probobly give you an A on every essay if you listen to the draft advise.

This is hands down easier than any English class I've ever taken- high school included. 
Class consists of 10 DB posts(completion grade), maybe 8 quizzes(super easy) and 3 papers, and within those 3 papers, there is a draft due with the last two that is graded based on completion. There's also no final, so forsure take this class!
Best professor i've ever had! I would take her for every class if i could. take her!!!

Professor Carter was fantastic. Reading was manageable; she provided excellent feedback and made it clear as to what she expected from the assignments. She offered several options often when it came to the content of each paper, and the theme of the course was genuinely intriguing and enjoyable. Would highly recommend taking her course!

Professor Carter was a very good teacher. She made great rubrics that told me exactly what she wanted on a paper. There were 3 papers in the class, with a fairly large research paper at the end. She does a great job giving feedback on the papers. If you follow the feedback she gives on the rough drafts, you are going to get an A. Would take again.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: BEST PROFESSOR I HAVE EVER TAKEN! She is such a sweet person and genuinely cares about your grade. As long as you read and complete the assignments, you are sure to get an A. She gives great feedback and is interested in your thoughts. I would take her 1000 times over. She truly made my semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Inspirational

comment: Prof. Carter was amazing! She has everything laid out for the week and made sure that everyone was on track. We had little weekly quizzes from the textbooks and had 2 major papers. Super easy course thanks to her.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Carter made everything so easy and accessible throughout the entire course. Her course, grading, and pacing allowed me to create a routine for the semester and get my work done. I learned more in her class than any other english class I've taken. Would so recommend!!!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Easy class. You write about what you want and the professor would help you out then you fix your writing and get a good grade.

Such a sweetheart. Would provide clear feedback on drafts from essays. She really cared about students and would even provide video lectures if she thought a chapter was particularly difficult to understand. Not too much reading, just depended on the week. Definitely my favorite professor from the semester

Prof Carter was amazing! She explained all expectations of her class through the syllabus and through announcement posts she would do at the beginning of each week. Some quizzes, three essays. A rough draft was required, but only graded on completion. She provided strong feedback to help you succeed and really cares about students. Definitely take.

She is one of my favorite professors for the semester-- her assignments are easy to understand and pretty lenient for grading. It gives a lot of open-note quizzes and discussion boards, which help add to your grade. Provides plenty of time for papers and attendance is mandatory but she gives plenty of work-from-home days. Take this class for sure!

Prof Morgan was seriously my favorite teacher my first semester. The papers were actually enjoyable to write and she was always happy to help. The textbook required was kind of boring, but the quizzes about the chapters are very easy and help pad your grade. Great class!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: such an awesome teacher! the grade in the class was based on 3 papers and weekly quizzes and discussion posts. the quizzes mirrored the assigned reading or the powerpoints she posted and the discussion boards were fairly easy. I highly recommend this professor!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Amazing Professor! Weekly work was a quiz and discussion board post a week. Three big essays over the semester with guaranteed 100% on Rough Draft's just for submitting them. Got 100% on my first two papers when they were nothing special and a 94% on my final paper. Last month of the class is basically just working on the final paper.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Professor Carter is amazing. I have always disliked English but she actually made it enjoyable. She responds to emails within minutes. She is extremely helpful. Grade is comprised of a few essays and weekly discussion posts. She grades a rough draft first and provides feedback so that your final draft can be as good as possible.
She was awesome. Never had an issue with her. She was approachable and gave awesome pointers.

THE BEST PROFESSOR EVER FOR ENGL 1101, I wish I could have taken her for 1102. She is young and just graduated as well so she is very caring, understanding, and relates well with her students. Her assignments are not difficult at all and she makes sure you understand everything and if you don't she will help!
Really loved this class! This class isnt an easy A, like any english class, but if you do your work and turn it in on time youll be fine.

Fairly easy English 2 class. Just put in your effort and submit on time and you'll be fine! Her rough drafts are basically completion grades. Just follow her directions and comments and you should struggle to get anything less than an A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: This class was so easy. There were discussion posts almost every week and about 4 papers/projects. There was a draft submission for almost all the papers and she gave great feedback. I made an A on all the papers because of this. She sends emails every Sunday to remind the class about what's due.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Really caring about her students. She wants to do whatever she can to help you do great and achieve what you want. She is a very fair grader and understanding. Gives great examples and very clear guidelines on material. Also gives some small extra credit if you use the writing center for assignments. Wonderful woman. Would take her again. 10/10

Prof. Morgan was incredible! One of my favorite professors at KSU. She answered every question I had about a paper, and she will help you where help is needed. She wants her students to do well, and she doesn't set them up for failure. You would be crazy not to take her!

The best professor I have EVER had at KSU. Each writing assignment that you do has to be submitted 2 times - the first submission is a grade of participation - easy 100 - she goes through your paper and makes corrections for you, so there's another 100 because she literally tells you what to correct. Very understanding, caring, and sweet.

As long as you meet the requirements for papers you should get a B. Course only really requires an hour and a half a week. After you submit your rough draft, she literally tells you what you need to change and do to your paper which makes it super easy to complete.

Professor Carter was an incredible teacher, and she puts effort into making you a better writer. She is very flexible with dates, as she understands students have work and other classes, as long as you contact her ahead of time. The topics she provides for essays are interesting and honestly fun. Her class was an awesome experience!

INCREDIBLE experience in this class. There were a couple of papers, but what english class doesnt have them? Willing to compromise on due dates if you speak with her privately and always willing to give help when needed. Super laid back and understanding. I wish I could take her for every class!

Great instructor, very understanding throughout semester. Wants you to succeed/will grant essay extensions with advanced notice. You have 3 major assignments and they all tie together. She lets you revise your writing assignments; required reading although its not tested upon. Lets you work from home frequently. Easy if you put in the effort! ��

LITERALLY THE BEST. morgan is so kind and teaches a great class. she tells you to read the textbook but likee i didnt't and I'm fine! Her grading is very clear and the class has an easy schedule to keep up with. The project and homework is fun and she relates to all the students very well. I want her to teach all my classes

So sweet. Young and understands the pressures were under as college students. Lots of opportunities to redo assignments if you do poorly and willing to extend a deadline for you if needed. we turned rough drafts of our work in first so she gives you feed back and pretty much guarantees you a good grade on anything. Would 100% recommend. So easy!

Ms. Carter was on of the best professors i have had this semester! Her class is very easy, her assignments are not rigorous at all. As long as you do what she asks for you will get a good grade. Only 2 essays with extra credit, one project, and a weekly journal entry. Super friendly and easy to talk to and relate to! Take her!

Take her! Shes young so shes super understanding and the works not too bad. I did hybrid and the online portion was very easy. Im not good with attendance but I always made it to her class. Shell never make you stay full class period.

I love Professor Carter. By far my favorite professor at Kennesaw. She really cares about you, and if you have any issues she is willing to work with you to solve them. You have weekly journal entries, 2 essays, and a project that you present as your "final". Her class is super easy if you do the work. Take her and her class they're the actual best

One of the easiest classes I've ever taken, and I respect her a lot. You have weekly journal entries you have to do, but those are put in place of a 10 page essay you would have to write for your final. She really cares about her students, and she is very passionate about English. Absolutely love her and her class.

Very reasonable, very chill if you want a fairly easy class that can also be fun take her course. She doesnt hand out grades though, you have to do the work but usually if you at least do it you should be fine

Professor Morgan was an amazing teacher, she made coming to class fun and exciting, she is very willing to work with you as long as you care about your grades. She gives great feedback and loves to help in any way she can. Loved this teacher!!

Awesome teacher! She engages the class and connects English to the world events that will help you understand different genres of writing. She is very sweet and understanding and if you need help writing because she knows that everyone is not a good writer. She is willing to help as long as you put in the effort.
She's a really great teacher, cares about helping her students. This was a very chill and fun class to take. I didn't really need the textbook either

Professor Morgan reshaped how I thought of English class. Instead of dreading the class, she made me excited to go. I love her and the way she handled this class. She was understanding, so as long as you put in the work, you will do fine. I highly recommend her, but if you do take her, be respectful. She is a gem and she deserves it.
